css: .filmstrip-gallery-section { font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; display: flex; width: 100%; height: 100vh; overflow: hidden; background-color: #111111; } .filmstrip-gallery-text-panel { width: 35%; height: 100%; background-color: #111111; color: #FFFFFF; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; padding: 3rem; z-index: 2; } .filmstrip-gallery-text-content { max-width: 400px; } .filmstrip-gallery-text-content h1 { font-size: 3rem; font-weight: 700; line-height: 1.1; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; } .filmstrip-gallery-text-content h2 { font-size: 1.2rem; font-weight: 400; color: #CCCCCC; margin-bottom: 2rem; } .filmstrip-gallery-text-content p { font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.7; color: #A0A0A0; } .filmstrip-gallery-scroll-panel { width: 65%; height: 100%; overflow-x: auto; overflow-y: hidden; scrollbar-width: none; /* Firefox */ } .filmstrip-gallery-scroll-panel::-webkit-scrollbar { display: none; /* Safari and Chrome */ } .filmstrip-gallery-wrapper { display: flex; height: 100%; width: max-content; } .filmstrip-gallery-wrapper img { height: 100%; width: auto; object-fit: cover; } @media (max-width: 992px) { .filmstrip-gallery-section { flex-direction: column; height: auto; } .filmstrip-gallery-text-panel { width: 100%; height: auto; text-align: center; padding: 4rem 2rem; } .filmstrip-gallery-scroll-panel { width: 100%; height: 50vh; } } @media (max-width: 576px) { .filmstrip-gallery-text-panel { padding: 3rem 1rem; } .filmstrip-gallery-text-content h1 { font-size: 2.5rem; } }
js: window.addEventListener('load', () => { document.querySelectorAll('img[src^="https://pixabay.com/api/"]').forEach(img => { fetch(img.src).then(response => response.json()).then(data => { if (data.hits && data.hits.length > 0) { img.src = data.hits[0].largeImageURL; } else { img.src = 'https://via.placeholder.com/1280x720?text=Image+Not+Found'; } }).catch(error => { console.error('Error fetching Pixabay image:', error); img.src = 'https://via.placeholder.com/1280x720?text=Image+Not+Found'; }); }); });
